function.name: convert
function.short: Convert quaternion to different underlying data type

long.para: convert(q, t) converts the components of a quaternion to a different data type. By default, the components of a quaternion have the default &matlab; data type double. The cast function implements the same functionality, and is to be preferred since it overloads a standard &matlab; function. Convert is retained for compatibility with code written before the cast function was implemented.
